properties.name: disabled
properties.description: To disable the spinbox component. If true, spinbox will be disabled.

properties.name: errorState
properties.description: To enable the error state. If true, spinbox will have an error state.

properties.name: iconType
properties.description: Type of icon to be shown, caret or plus-minus.

properties.name: inputList
properties.description: An array of valid numbers, from lowest to highest, that represent the valid values in 'array' type.

properties.name: inputListValue
properties.description: The value for the spinbox component when type = array.

properties.name: inputValue
properties.description: The value for the spinbox component when type = number. If no value is specified, it will be set to the minimum value.

properties.name: isExponentAllowed
properties.description: If true, the input can contain 'e' which is used for exponential notation. For example, 1e2 would be 100.

properties.name: isIntegerOnly
properties.description: If true, the input must be an integer value. The '.' symbol cannot be used.

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum value of the spinbox. When max is less than or equal to 0, the '+' character is not allowed.

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum value of the spinbox. When min is greater than or equal to 0, the '-' character is not allowed.

properties.name: step
properties.description: The number intervals of the spinbox.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of the spinbox, either 'number' or 'array'.

EDSSpinbox.description: A **spin box** is a textbox form field that accepts a range of values. It incorporates two buttons that allow the user to increase or decrease the value by a fixed amount.
EDSSpinbox.name: Spin Box
EDSSpinbox.usage:
eds-spinbox is a web component for entering a number. It includes built-in
validation to reject non-numerical entries as well as a keyboard binding to
increase or decrease the input value with the up and down arrows respectively.

The following CSS variables are available for styling :

CSS Variable | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--eds-spinbox-text-color | Color for the text
--eds-spinbox-background-color | Color for the background
--eds-spinbox-border-color | Color for the border
--eds-spinbox-border-focused-color | Color for the border in hover/focus state
--eds-spinbox-border-pressed-color | Color for the border in pressed state
--eds-spinbox-disabled-background-color | Color for the background while disabled
--eds-spinbox-disabled-text-color | Color for the text while disabled
--eds-spinbox-icon-background-pressed | Color for the icon background in pressed/active state
--eds-spinbox-icon-color-pressed | Color for the icon in pressed/active state
